name: synthwave-dark-blue
description: A darker shade in SynthWave '84 by robb0wen, a Synthwave-inspired color theme to satisfy your neon dreams
author: Gatomontes

commands.title: Synthwave '84 Dark Blue: Enable Neon Dreams
Synthwave '84 Dark Blue: Disable Neon Dreams Dark Blue

synthwave84DarkBlue.brightness.description: Set the brightness value for the glow effect. 0.0 is fully transparent and 1.0 is fully bright

synthwave84DarkBlue.disableGlow.description: Disable the glow effect, but show Synthwave '84 editor chrome updates
